titles.title: Home Office Deduction Simplification Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a standard home office deduction.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1168)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/9/2008--Introduced.
Home Office Deduction Simplification Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer who uses a residence to conduct a trade or business a standard tax deduction equal to the lesser of $1,500 or the taxpayer's gross trade or business income derived from the business use of such residence.
